nodes.text: Unidentified contender for the Noble Court's throne

Several months into the Imperial blockade of the Anoat sector, a sinister contender for the throne of the Noble Court-in-exile claimed a right to duel Her Majesty, the sitting ruler of the court. However, the queen was permitted a champion to fight in her name.
The Smuggler, an ally of Her Majesty, provided her with a member of their crew to act as her champion.
